Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to prove that the Trump campaign actually posted the Craigslist ad.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the ad was posted by the Trump campaign without any concrete evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Trump campaign denies posting the ad.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in the claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation for the existence of the ad.
